name: iron knit hat
notes:
note: this pattern is available for free on my blog!

easy, warm, stylish, comfy and so on. i can talk a lot about iron knit hat. to make sure you should definitely try knitting this hat. the hat perfectly fits both men and women. optionally, you can add a fur or yarn pom pom.

**video tutorial**: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5gpydtfulio 

you are welcome to follow my **youtube** channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/ucwqwxlyqk9vjedzoiqjw-wa
